title: website: Golang.org blocks DigitalOcean Frankfurt IPv6 ranges
body:
1) What version of Go are you using (go version)? 1.5 2) What operating system and processor architecture are you using? Ubuntu 14.04 server on DigitalOcean's Frankfurt instance. 3) What did you do? Try to download Go binary 4) What did you expect to see? A successful http request. 5) What did you see instead? 403 Forbidden ``` AccessDenied Access denied.
We're sorry, but this service is not available in your location
 ``` If I disable IPv6 or set IPv4 preferred, I am able to download the binary succesfully. More info, https://gist.github.com/jrasanen/a3276494d58bc93a88de https://gist.github.com/jrasanen/abfdf1c864897baa8717
